name: Pitch reference
description: This algorithm simply generates a sine wave tone at a particular pitch or frequency. Note that if using a note to specify the pitch, it respects the global tuning setting.

output_ports.name: Output mode
output_ports.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

output_ports.name: Amplitude
output_ports.description: The amplitude of the signal (before the gain is applied).
